source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_00<tab>Wedge wears the expression of a man at his wit's end.
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_00<tab>ラールガーズリーチのウェッジは、途方に暮れているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_01<tab>In the course of their search for Omega, your friends at the Garlond Ironworks have come to Rhalgr's Reach. Apparently, however, they have since encountered some manner of problem which is hindering further progress. That you might grasp the nature of the problem in question, Wedge invites you to join him and Biggs at the workshop.
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_01<tab>ウェッジから、オメガの消息を探っているガーロンド・アイアンワークス社に協力するよう頼まれた。ラールガーズリーチの「ビッグス」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_02<tab>You learn to your surprise that Nero tol Scaeva has been offered employment at the Ironworks without prior approval from Cid, who is none too pleased. At length, he grudgingly agrees to tolerate his old rival's presence, and takes the opportunity to beseech your aid in the ongoing investigation into Omega. Moments later, an engineer rushes in with grave tidings: aetheric readings have risen alarmingly at the Yawn, where Omega is thought to be hiding. Fearing the worst, Cid resolves at once to visit the scene and asks that you accompany him.
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_02<tab>ビッグスと話し、シドとネロの喧嘩を止めた。オメガの潜伏地と思しき場所で、何か変化が起きたようだ。ギラバニア辺境地帯のヤーンの大穴にいる「シド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_03<tab>As you stare at the pool of condensed aether that fills the Yawn, Midgardsormr stirs from his slumber to inform you that Omega does indeed await within. Then, without warning, a chocobo-like creature bursts out of the pool followed by an enormous, translucent serpent. Once the initial panic has passed, Midgardsormr explains that Omega is capable of bringing forth life, and that the serpent was one of its creations. All eyes duly turn to what appears to be an approximation of a chocobo, which has settled at the party's side.
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_03<tab>シドたちと大穴を観察していたところ、中から何かが飛び出してきた。ヤーンの大穴の「チョコボ？」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_04<tab>Through Midgardsormr, the chocobo describes a strange plane beyond the Yawn. There, Omega appears to be testing its creations, and the only way to find out more is to venture in─by taking a plunge into the pink pool.
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_04<tab>おそらくチョコボと思われる存在が、大穴の先から来たことを聞きだした。ヤーンの大穴の「シド」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_05<tab>Together with your comrades, you jump into the Yawn and find yourself in a rift between dimensions. Shortly thereafter, Omega reaches out to you via one of its monitors and declares that you are to participate in an experiment. It seeks to determine the mightiest being by pitting subjects against one another in combat, to which end it has selected and recreated eighty-nine entities. You are provisionally assigned to the Alpha group, so named for your new chocobo friend, and your first task will be to fight your way to a place called the Deltascape. In so doing, you will prove your fitness to be fully fledged test subjects.

※In the event that you leave the Interdimensional Rift, you may re-enter by speaking with the Ironworks hand at the Yawn.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_05<tab>シドと話し、大穴の中……次元の狭間に突入した。オメガから検証への参加を持ちかけられ、正式エントリーを果たすために、被検世界デルタを目指すことになった。次元の狭間の先へと進もう。
一度外に出た場合は、ヤーンの大穴にいる「ガーロンド社の調査員」が、次元の狭間へ案内してくれるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_06<tab>You win through to the egg-shaped Deltascape─one of many such structures floating in the rift─thereby confirming your status as test subjects...albeit the weakest of them all. Omega duly grants you time and space to prepare for your next trial: entering the Deltascape and defeating all the subjects within. After your host leaves, you and your companions set about establishing an improvised base of operations.
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_06<tab>被検世界デルタに到達し、正式に、アルファの仲間として検証に参加することになった。次元の狭間の「シド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_07<tab>Having secured a foothold in the rift, the party turns its attention to the challenges that lie ahead. Whatever else stands between you and Omega, there seems little doubt that your combat skills will be tested to their limit...and perhaps beyond.
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SEQ_07<tab>シドと話した。改めて、「次元の狭間 オメガ」の調査をはじめていこう！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_000<tab>Well, I'll be damned! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! If this isn't fate, I don't know what is.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_000<tab>おっ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>じゃないか！
こりゃあもう、宿命ってもんだな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_010<tab><gasp> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, thank the gods you're here! We need your help!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_010<tab>あーっ！？
ここで会ったが百年目ッス！
お願いッス、力を貸してほしいッス～！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_011<tab>In case you haven't heard, we've set up operations in Rhalgr's Reach, while we look for Omega.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_011<tab>今、オイラたち「ガーロンド・アイアンワークス」は、
ここラールガーズリーチに支社を作って、
消えた「オメガ」の捜索をしてるッス……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_012<tab>It's been decidedly slow going, I'm sorry to say, and we still haven't seen the blasted thing since it disappeared during the battle with Shinryu.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_012<tab>ほら、「神龍」と「オメガ」の戦いは、
ピカーッと光って、結果がよく見えなかったッス？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_013<tab>...Which is not to say we haven't made any progress. We know now that Shinryu ended up in the imperials' hands, and that it was shackled with some very distinctive-looking bindings when they found it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_013<tab>そのあと、神龍だけが、帝国軍に捕らえられた……。
制圧された帝国基地から得た情報によると、
神龍は、発見時すでに拘束されていたらしいッス。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_014<tab>Obviously, only you-know-what could have done something like that, and the fact that the restraints were still functioning suggests it didn't shut down when the chief instructed it to either.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_014<tab>そんなことができるのは、
バハムートを捕えしもの「オメガ」だけッス！
そして拘束具が機能していた以上、本体も停止してないッス！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_015<tab>Anyway, we were getting close to identifying Omega's whereabouts when we encountered...what you might call...a problem. Mayhap it would be best if you came to the workshop and saw for yourself.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_015<tab>……ってことで「オメガ」の潜伏先を探ってたけど、
ここにきて大事件発生ッス……。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>、うちの支社に来て、助けてほしいッス！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_020<tab>Go on! <var 1A 02 /var>Suggest something<var 1A 01 /var>! And I'll be sure to do the exact bloody opposite!
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_020<tab>ふざけるな！　信じられるか！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_025<tab>Come now, <var 1A 02 /var>Chief<var 1A 01 /var>... That isn't terribly constructive.
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_025<tab>そうカッカするなよ、会長サン？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_030<tab>...Spot the problem?
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_030<tab>これッス……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_JESSIE_000_035<tab><sigh> So much for improving efficiency...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_JESSIE_000_035<tab>はー……せっかく大型新人を採用したのに、
これじゃ効率が下がるばっかりだわ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_040<tab>...Surprised? Aye, so were we. He's been brought in as a “consultant,” believe it or not.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_040<tab>……驚きだろ？
最近うちに入った大型新人……ご存じ、ネロだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_041<tab>How many times do I have to tell you!? You will play <var 1A 02 /var>no part<var 1A 01 /var> in this investigation!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_041<tab>ええい、何度言わせるんだ……！
ネロ、お前はオメガの調査に参加させない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_042<tab>Your motives were dubious from the first, and nothing you have done since has served to make them any clearer.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_042<tab>そもそも、神龍への対抗策として、
オメガの起動を持ちかけてきたこと自体、怪しかったんだ。
大方、お前自身が、オメガを研究したかったんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_043<tab>Out of necessity, I agreed to take part in Omega's activation, but that will be the extent of our cooperation!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_043<tab>あのときは、必要性を認めたから起動に同意したが……
これ以上、お前をオメガに近づけるのは容認できない！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_044<tab>Passing judgment without due consideration, openly disparaging colleagues... Not very chiefly of you, Chief.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_044<tab>おいおい、勝手に決めつけて頭ごなしに叱るなンて、
上司として最悪だな、ガーロンドォ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_045<tab>I'll have you know I'm a sensitive new recruit who thrives on encouragement.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_045<tab>オレは新人だぜ？
それも……ほめられて伸びるタイプのなぁ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_046<tab>Then I trust you'll thrive elsewhere when I encourage you to piss off!
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_046<tab>そんなふてぶてしい新人がいるかッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_047<tab>I will not have him on our roster, Jessie─never mind anywhere near our work. His employment is to be terminated, effective immediately!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_047<tab>ジェシー！
本日づけで、こいつは解雇だ、解雇！
出戻りも許さないぞ……潔く、永久に、籍を消せ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_JESSIE_000_048<tab>The thing is, Chief...we've already paid him in full. And it wasn't exactly a pittance, either. Four-fifths what you get was the agreement.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_JESSIE_000_048<tab>えー……。
契約金はもう払っちゃいましたよ？
会長の次回給与の8割を譲渡しろっていうから、それで。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_JESSIE_000_049<tab>Look, whatever disagreements you might've had in the past, the fact is, we could do with his expertise now. Let him earn his keep, at the very least.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_JESSIE_000_049<tab>経歴はともかく、
古代技術研究の第一人者なのは間違いないんだし、
払った契約金の分くらいは、働いてもらったらどうです？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_050<tab>I don't believe this... You claim my <var 1A 02 /var>wholly justified<var 1A 01 /var> ventures represent an “unsustainable risk to the Ironworks”─and then pay him a sultan's ransom in advance!? <var 1A 02 /var>Him<var 1A 01 /var>!? Give me strength...!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_050<tab>おかしい、絶対におかしい……！
いつのまに、そんな横暴な経理がまかり通る会社に……！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_100_050<tab>This has been the way of it for a while now... On account of which, we've had to put the investigation on hold...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_100_050<tab>……とまあ、こんな問答がずっと続いててな？
オレたちだけで、勝手にオメガの調査を進めるわけにもいかず、
困り果ててるってわけだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_Q1_000_051<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_Q1_000_051<tab>どうする？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_A1_000_052<tab>Let's investigate by ourselves.
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_A1_000_052<tab>……ほっといて、調査を進めようか

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_A1_000_053<tab>Let me know how it goes. I'm leaving.
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_A1_000_053<tab>それじゃあ、自分はこのへんで

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_054<tab>Tsk-tsk. As much as I admire your enthusiasm, hero, you will not get very far without some brains to complement your admirable brawn. Happily, I am blessed with a surfeit of the former.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_054<tab>おっと、そこの冒険者……抜け駆けはよくないぜ？
だが、やる気があンのは上等だ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_055<tab>From this moment forth, you shall be my chaperone. With the realm's savior watching my every move, I couldn't possibly make any mischief─which should surely serve to allay my employer's concerns?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_055<tab>よし、たった今から、お前をオレの目付け役にする。
英雄殿がついてたら、悪事なンて働けないだろう？
それなら、頭の固い会長だって、同行を許すはずだね。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_056<tab>Tsk-tsk. It is not like you to shirk your duties, hero. Were you not present at Omega's activation? And are you not therefore jointly responsible for the havoc it may wreak if left to its own devices? I think we both know the answer.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_056<tab>待て待て、オレに気付かれてないとでも思ったか？
残念だが、お前もオメガの起動に立ち会ったンだ……
ここは連帯責任といこうぜ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_057<tab>From this moment forth, you shall be my chaperone. With the realm's savior watching my every move, I couldn't possibly make any mischief─which should surely serve to allay my employer's concerns?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_057<tab>ということで、お前は今からオレの目付け役になれ。
英雄殿がついてたら、悪事なンて働けないだろう？
それなら、頭の固い会長だって、同行を許すはずだね。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_058<tab>Forgive me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It was not my intent to embroil you in this mess. I didn't even know you were here. Seeing as you are, though...I cannot deny that I would be glad to have you on board.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_058<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、来てたのか……。
まきこんですまないが、ネロの目付け役どうのはともかく、
お前が調査に協力してくれるとしたら心強い。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_059<tab>The fact is, we are no closer to understanding the true extent of Omega's powers, and even if it was damaged during its encounter with Shinryu, it seems highly doubtful that we will be able to disable it unaided.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_059<tab>なにせ、オメガの力は、全容すら知れないほどだ……。
神龍との戦いで、あちらにも多少の損傷はあるだろうが、
技師だけで対応できる脅威だとは、とても思えない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_060<tab>We have got as far as identifying its likely resting place, but I for one would feel a lot more confident about surveying the area with you around to deal with any unexpected surprises. Might I persuade you to lend us a hand once more, old friend?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_060<tab>現状、奴の潜伏先と思しき場所をしぼるには至ったが、
この先は、冒険者の手助けなしには踏み込めないだろう。
……改めて、協力を頼めないか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_061<tab>Then it's settled!
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_061<tab>……決まりだな！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_STAFF02928_000_062<tab>Ch-Chief, we have a problem! The aetheric concentration levels at the Yawn are soaring. Our readings doubled from one moment to the next, and by the time we went to check them, they'd doubled again!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_STAFF02928_000_062<tab>か、会長、緊急事態です！
ポイントワン「ヤーンの大穴」で、エーテル濃度が急上昇！
何か……ヤバいことになりそうです……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_063<tab>What? But that could only mean─
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_063<tab>なんだって……！？
まさか、オメガに何か動きが……？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_064<tab>Evacuate the site. I shall handle this matter personally.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_064<tab>ともかく、現場の調査員たちは、一時退避させてくれ。
以降の調査は、俺たちが直接預かる。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_065<tab>Biggs, Wedge, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I need you with me at the Yawn, to the south of here. That's where we believe Omega came to rest.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_065<tab>ビッグス、ウェッジ、それに<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
俺と一緒に、オメガ潜伏先の最有力候補……
ピーリングストーンズ付近にある「ヤーンの大穴」に来てくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_066<tab>Jessie─hold the fort while I'm gone. And, if possible, continue surveillance from a safe distance.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_066<tab>ジェシーはここに残って、社員たちへの指示を。
できれば、安全な位置から観測を続けてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_JESSIE_000_067<tab>All right, Chief. Watch yourself out there.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_JESSIE_000_067<tab>了解ッ。
会長、みんなも、気をつけてね……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_068<tab>...Am I to stay and <var 1A 02 /var>mind the shop<var 1A 01 /var> too?
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_068<tab>……オレにも留守番しろって？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_069<tab>Oh no. I'm not letting you out of my sight. But before you fill the room with maniacal laughter, I want you to remember something: when you collected your inexplicably lavish fee, the Ironworks' creed became <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> creed. That's “Freedom through Technology,” in case you've forgotten─not “Supremacy through Allagan Ingenuity.” Breach this contract and I will have my ponze of flesh.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_069<tab>うちの社訓は「技術は自由のために」だ。
……社員を自称するなら、それだけは必ず守れ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_JESSIE_000_070<tab>I'll take care of things here. Look after everyone for me, all right? I need the boys back and innovating before our customers tire of our current offerings.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_JESSIE_000_070<tab>ほかの社員のことは任せて。
あなたは、会長たちのこと、よろしくね。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_075<tab>Hah, would you look at that!
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_075<tab>見ろよ、面白いことになってやがる！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_080<tab>I've got a bad feeling about this...
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_080<tab>こいつは……なんて禍々しい……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_085<tab>C-Crikey! It was just a plain old hole before!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_085<tab>さっきまで、ただの大穴だったのに！
いったい、どうしちゃったッス！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_100<tab>What in the seven hells is going on here?
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_100<tab>これは……何が起きている……！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_101<tab>A veritable sea of condensed aether... Our precious has been busy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_101<tab>赤い水……のように見えるが、違うな。
可視化するほど濃密なエーテルが溜まってやがる。
お探しのカワイコチャンの仕業か？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_102<tab>(-???-)Hmmm... What villainy is this?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_102<tab>(-？？？？-)ふむ……。
先ごろより、懐かしい気配がしおるではないか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_103<tab>In slumber sweet have I lain since mine offsprings' war with man did end. Yet I could not choose but stir at this abhorrent stench.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_103<tab>我が子らと、ヒトの戦が終わり、
我もまた、微睡みに揺蕩っておったのだがな……。
この醜悪な気を鼻先にちらつかされては、目も覚めよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_104<tab>Have care, mortal. For within this great hollow lieth Omega.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_104<tab>ヒトの子よ、用心するがよい。
……オメガは確かに、この大穴の先におるぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_105<tab>Long have we known one another. Our history spanneth eons and stars.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_105<tab>なに、我と奴とは旧知……
遠い昔、遠い星からの因縁よ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_106<tab>Oh gods, what's happening!?
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_106<tab>な、な、なんか出てきたッスーーーーー！？！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_107<tab>Chief! Get out of there!
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_107<tab>親方、逃げろオオォォォォ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_108<tab>Eh!? You─ You're not dead!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_108<tab>……って、食われてない？
い、いったいなにが！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_109<tab>Apparently not. It passed straight through me...as if it were some sort of illusion.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_109<tab>体を通り抜けていった……のか……？
まるで幻影だ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_110<tab>'Tis one of Omega's creations.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_110<tab>……ふむ。
あれは、オメガめの創造物であろうな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_111<tab>Omega is a weapon wrought in a place beyond the reach of thy kind, capable of weaving aether into life.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_111<tab>オメガは、この星がいまだ至らぬ文明域で造られた兵器。
エーテルへの干渉を可能とし、
望むがままに生命を生みおとす……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_112<tab>That serpent is yet unfinished, but doubt not that it will become a corporeal threat ere long.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_112<tab>あれはまだ製造の途中……
物質界に顕現しきれぬ半端者のようだが、
いずれは触れうる脅威となろうぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_113<tab>Well, whatever it is, it's gone.
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_113<tab>帰っていった……みたいだな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_114<tab>While this peculiar thing remains.
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_114<tab>あちらさンは、まだ残ってるがな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_ALPHA_000_115<tab>(-???-)Kweh?
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_116<tab>If it looks like a chocobo...and <var 1A 02 /var>kwehs<var 1A 01 /var> like a chocobo...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_116<tab>黄色い羽……大きなくちばし……
そして何より、その鳴き声…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_117<tab>...I'm thinking it's probably a chocobo?
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_117<tab>もしかして……チョコボ、ッス……？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_120<tab>I've no idea what it is, but it doesn't seem to pose any immediate threat.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_120<tab>こいつはいったい……。
害があるようには見えないが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_125<tab>Fascinating. We should dissect it. In the name of science.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_125<tab>こいつは愉快だな。
思い切って、解剖でもしてみるか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_130<tab>...It looks like a chocobo in the same way a mammet looks like a person, if you know what I mean?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_130<tab>チョコボ……いや、本当にチョコボか？
マメットと言われた方が、まだ納得するんだが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_135<tab>You heard him kweh, didn't you? He's a chocobo, I'm sure of it!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_135<tab>さっき、クエッって鳴いたッス！
だから、チョコボにちがいないッス！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_ALPHA_000_140<tab>Kweh?
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_ALPHA_000_140<tab>……クエッ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_141<tab>Hmmm... The way it kwehs isn't unlike a chocobo, but it looks more like a stuffed doll to me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_141<tab>うーむ……。
確かに鳴き声はチョコボに似ている……気もするが……
俺には、着ぐるみか何かにしか見えないんだが。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_142<tab>It's definitely a chocobo, trust me on this. The ones we Lalafells ride are all about this size, aren't they?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_142<tab>そんなことないッス、絶対チョコボッス！
ララフェル族が乗るチョコボなんて、
いつも大体こんなもんッス！

source:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_143<tab>I s'pose...
Aye, all right, let's go with chocobo for now.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_143<tab>そ、そうかぁ……？
まあ、ほかに呼びようもないし、一旦チョコボにしておくか。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_144<tab>Thy mistress's blessing extendeth not unto this creature's soul, then...?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_144<tab>汝の「超える力」をもってしても、意思疎通できぬか。
となると……ふむ…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_145<tab>Very well. As this matter concerneth Omega, I shall speak with it in thy stead.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_145<tab>よい、ことオメガめに関する事態だ。
我がこの者と対話しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_146<tab>Uh...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Aren't you going to introduce us to your knowledgeable little dragon friend?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_146<tab>……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、あの子竜は何なんだ？
オメガと旧知とか言っていたような気がするが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_147<tab>What, <var 1A 02 /var>the<var 1A 01 /var> Midgardsormr─who fought and fell at the Battle of Silvertear Skies!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_147<tab>ミドガルズオルムの分身、だと……！？
あの、銀泪湖で戦艦アグリウスと相討ちになった……！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_148<tab>And here I was, content to be traveling in the company of just <var 1A 02 /var>one<var 1A 01 /var> legend. Without wishing to offend you, hero, the Father of Dragons does have something you do not, that being relevant knowledge. There is much we could learn from him...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_148<tab>さっすが稀代の冒険者、おかしなもンつれてやがる。
しかし、それが本当だってんなら、
最高にオモシロイ情報提供者じゃないか。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_0149<tab>Little and less is known about Omega's origin. It first appeared in records dating back to the Third Astral Era, before the Allagan Empire reached its zenith, and said records had but the one thing to say: “Omega activation successful.”
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_0149<tab>なにせ、オメガについて、人が知っていることは少ない。
歴史上、最初にその名が出てくるのは第三星暦の中期……
古代アラグ帝国の治世が黄金期にさしかかる前だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_150<tab>In the centuries that followed, the Allagans enjoyed rapid technological development, but there was nary a further mention of Omega until its capture of Bahamut.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_150<tab>記録にはただ一言……「オメガの起動に成功せり」と。
それを境に、アラグ帝国は魔科学を急速に発展させたようだが、
蛮神「バハムート」捕獲までは、ほかに一切の記述がない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_151<tab>Its existence is a mystery among mysteries, a tale among tales. 'Twas always assumed that the Allagans built it, and I had no reason to believe otherwise.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_151<tab>まさに、浪漫あふれるロストテクノロジーってことだ。
だがしかし、アラグ帝国の産物であるって定説までは、
オレも信じてたンだがねぇ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_152<tab>But now Midgardsormr tells us that it's not even of our world.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_152<tab>……俺の聞き間違いでなければ、ミドガルズオルムが、
「この星がいまだ至らぬ文明域で造られた兵器」と、
言っていなかったか……？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_153<tab>Just so. It haileth from another star. More than that I will not say.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_153<tab>それについて、今深くを語ることはせぬ。
ただ、彼方より来たりし脅威と知るがよい……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_154<tab>I have spoken with this being. It telleth of a strange plane beyond this hollow, wherein it did reside from the moment of its creation.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_154<tab>……それよりも、この者から事情を聞きだせた。
穴の先には特殊な空間があり、気がつくとそこにいたそうだ。
それ以前の記憶はないらしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_155<tab>For reasons unknown, it was ordered to fight. Yet being weak, it chose flight instead, and thus crossed over unto this world.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_155<tab>わけのわからぬまま先の敵と戦うよう命じられたものの、
ひとりでは敵うに能わず、
逃げているうちに、ここへ飛び出したとのこと……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_156<tab>Ordered to fight...by Omega? Why in the seven hells would it do that?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_156<tab>命じられた、って……
あの穴の先にいるのはオメガなんだろう？
奴が、何か物騒な企みをしてるってことか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_157<tab>To put its creations to the proof.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_157<tab>左様……。
先も言ったが、オメガめはエーテルを自在に繰り、
疑似生命を生みおとす……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_158<tab>If you would know more, go forth and look upon the truth with your own eyes.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_158<tab>先の追跡者の様子を見るに、
造りかけの生命を戦わせ、試しているといったところか。
……それ以上は、己が目で確かめよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_159<tab>Wait...you're saying we should jump in!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_159<tab>お、己が目って……
穴の中に飛び込めってことッス！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_160<tab>You have naught to fear from the fall. The hollow hath become a portal into Omega's domain. Once there, this being shall guide you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_160<tab>あの穴は、今や異界に繋がる門と化している。
翼なき汝らが飛び込もうと、死することはあるまい……。
中については、この者が案内するそうだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_161<tab>Servant of Hydaelyn... Fate bindeth me to Omega. If it be thine intent to pursue it, I shall lend thee my strength.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_MIDGARDSORMR_000_161<tab>ハイデリンの使徒よ……。
オメガとの旧き因縁こそは、ほかならぬ我自身のもの。
かかるうちは、眠りを遠ざけ、汝らに力を貸そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_162<tab>So you, uh...really can show us around inside the hole, can you?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_162<tab>えーっと……チョコボ？
大穴の中の案内、できちゃうッス？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_ALPHA_000_163<tab>Kweh! Kweh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_ALPHA_000_163<tab>クエッ、クエーッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_ALPHA_000_170<tab>Kweh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_ALPHA_000_170<tab>クエッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_175<tab>Hm hm! This day just keeps getting better and better!
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_175<tab>ククク、ますます愉快になってきやがった！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_180<tab>Are we seriously thinking about going for a dip in that pink muck?
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_180<tab>この大穴に飛び込むって……正気か！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_185<tab>I-I'm not too keen on this jumping idea. There are rocks that can swim better than me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_185<tab>ホントのホントに、入っても平気ッス！？
オイラ泳げないッス！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_189<tab>Well...I doubt any of us imagined things would come to this, but the Father of Dragons has given his assurance. Let us take our investigation into the Yawn.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_189<tab>まさかこんな事態になるとは思わなかったが……
幻龍に助言されたとあらば、無視するわけにもいかない。
大穴の調査を敢行しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_190<tab>I have already apprised Jessie of our intent and instructed her to have our engineers on standby.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_190<tab>ジェシーには、リンクパールで連絡を入れておいた。
大穴の先では、何が起こるかわからないからな……
ほかの社員は待機させて、俺たちだけで調査に向かおうと思う。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_191<tab>Since we have no way of knowing what awaits us in there, I need you to be ready for anything. Are you?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_191<tab>オメガの状態はわからないが、お前は戦いに備えておいてくれ。
……行けそうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_192<tab>Let us begin!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_192<tab>では、行くぞ……！
大穴に飛び込んで、オメガの潜伏先を調査する！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_200<tab>Wh-What is this place!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_200<tab>こ、ここはどこッス？
オイラたち、あの大穴に突入したはずッス！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_201<tab>And what's wrong with us!? I can see straight through me!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_201<tab>体も、透けちまってるぞ……！
何が起きてるってんだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_202<tab>(-???-)Welcome home, Alpha. Welcome, mortals.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_202<tab>(-？？？？-)おかえりなさい、アルファ。
そしてようこそ、ヒトのみなさん。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_203<tab>I am Omega, and I have awaited your coming. I communicate with you now via one of my monitors.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_203<tab>歓迎……アナタがたの到来を、待望していました。
紹介……ワタシは、オメガ。
端末「レベルチェッカー」を介して、交信を試みています。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_204<tab>You stand in the rift between dimensions, where a vital experiment is presently in progress.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_204<tab>この場所、ワタシの領域「次元の狭間」では、
現在、重大な検証が行われています。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_205<tab>Your participation is appreciated. Please indicate your consent. <blip>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_205<tab>アナタがたも、すみやかに参加してください。
ガガ……エントリーしますか？
ガガガ…………エントリーしますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_206<tab>Experiment? If you want our participation, you'll have to tell us a little more than that.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_206<tab>検証、だと？
詳細も目的も聞かずに、参加できるわけがあるか……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_207<tab>Uwaaah! We're disappearing!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_207<tab>うわわわ！？
体がどんどん透明になってくッスー！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_208<tab>Non-participating entities will be summarily erased. Please indicate your consent. <blip>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_208<tab>エントリーを、しなさい。
しないのであれば、存在を容認できません。
繰り返します、エントリーを……エントリーを…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_209<tab>It seems we can't even exist here without Omega's leave.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_209<tab>おい、マズいぜ……！
この空間じゃ、ただ「居る」ことすら、
オメガの許可なしでは成立しないらしい……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_210<tab>I think it's fairly clear what we have to do, don't you!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_210<tab>存在の格が違いすぎる！
もたもたしてると、本気で消去されンぞッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_Q3_000_211<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_Q3_000_211<tab>なんと答える？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_A3_000_212<tab>All right! We consent!
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_A3_000_212<tab>検証でもなんでも、やってやる！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_A3_000_213<tab>Chocobo, what should we do!?
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_A3_000_213<tab>チョコボ、打つ手はない！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_214<tab>Thank you for your cooperation. You are provisionally assigned to the Alpha group.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_214<tab>承諾……参加の意思を受けとります。
彼らを、アルファグループに仮エントリーしましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_215<tab>Looks like some manner of tower...or egg.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_215<tab>あれはなんだ……？
塔……いや、卵か…………？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_216<tab>The aim of the experiment is to determine the mightiest being in creation.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_216<tab>改めまして、「次元の狭間」のロビーへようこそ。
ワタシは、ここで「最高の強者」を選別するために、
実戦を用いた検証を行っています。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_217<tab>To that end, eighty-nine candidates have been selected and recreated. They are grouped by dimension, matched by strength, and pitted against one another.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_217<tab>対象……ワタシが選出し、再現した、89体の疑似生命。
彼らを棲息時空ごとにグループ化し、
戦闘力の見込値に従ってマッチング、強弱を確定させています。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_218<tab>That which you identify as a chocobo is subject Alpha, and you have been assigned to its group.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_218<tab>アナタがたが、チョコボと認識したその個体……
正式名「アルファ」も、被検体のうち。
そのグループの構成員に、アナタがたをエントリーしました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_219<tab>This assignation is tentative, however, pending an assessment of your fitness to serve as fully fledged test subjects. Your combat capabilities will be evaluated shortly.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_219<tab>しかし、現在は仮エントリーの状態。
正式な検証参加者とすべきか判断するため、
これより、アナタがたの戦闘力を調査します。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_220<tab>Combat capabilities? You mean you want us to fight?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_220<tab>戦闘力の調査……
つまり、戦えと言いたいのか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_221<tab>Affirmative. A course shall be constructed for this purpose, through which you must attempt to fight your way. Your suitability will be confirmed upon reaching the Deltascape test world beyond.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_221<tab>肯定……この先にいくつかの模擬戦を用意します。
それらを乗り越え、ゴール地点……
被検世界「デルタ」を目指してください。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_222<tab>Please note, however, that only entities with existential authorization may interact with objects in the rift.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_222<tab>ただし、「次元の狭間」で物事に干渉できるのは、
ワタシから権利を付与された個体だけ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_223<tab>Of your number, only Alpha has this at present.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_223<tab>現在、アルファグループにおいては、
当初より検証に参加していたアルファ本人にのみ、
干渉の権利が与えられています。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_224<tab>Before you may engage in combat, said authorization must be temporarily transferred to you. <blip> <bloop>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_224<tab>ゆえに、アルファから一時的に権利の譲渡を受けたのち、
戦闘行為を開始してください。
ガガガ……ガガガガ…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_225<tab>Hah, an invitation from Omega itself! Not even I could've foreseen this!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_225<tab>クク……こいつはトンデモ展開だ！
さすがの俺も、予想だにしていなかった！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_226<tab>We are accepting it, of course? It's preferable to summary erasure, as I'm sure you'll agree.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_226<tab>……が、ほかでもないオメガ自身のご招待なンだぜ？
成果も得ずに逃げ帰るなんて、できないよなぁ……？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_227<tab>Alpha, was it? My colleagues and I are minded to participate in Omega's experiment. Will you transfer your authorization to us?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_227<tab>チョコボ……いや、名前はアルファか。
俺たちは調査を進めるため、検証とやらに乗っかろう。
物事に干渉する権利というのを、貸してもらえるか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_LEVELCHECKER_000_228<tab><beep> Existential authorization transferred. Subjects ready to engage. Please begin at your own convenience and proceed as directed.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_LEVELCHECKER_000_228<tab>ガガ……権利の譲渡を確認……戦闘準備完了。
これより、レベルチェッカーに進行を委任します。
それでは、スタートしてください。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_230<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Will you be descending into the Yawn?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_230<tab>「次元の狭間」の調査、おつかれさまです！
大穴の中に降りますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SYSTEM_000_231<tab>Enter the Interdimensional Rift?
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_SYSTEM_000_231<tab>「次元の狭間」に移動しますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_250<tab>That's our goal, the Deltascape, if I'm not mistaken. What do you think is waiting for us in there?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_250<tab>あれが指定されたゴール地点……
被検世界「デルタ」とやらで間違いないようだな。
……どう見る、ネロ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_251<tab>Omega said that it groups subjects by dimension.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_251<tab>……オメガは、「最高の強者」となりうる被検者を、
棲息時空ごとにグループ化したとか言ってやがったな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_252<tab>If the creatures we fought on the way were merely intended to separate the wheat from the chaff, it would seem certain that far greater challenges await inside these egg-like objects─our fellow test subjects, most like...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_252<tab>ここに至る道中で戦ったのを、計測用の雑魚とすれば……
あの卵らしき物体の中に、本命である、
いずれかの被検者グループがいる……ってのが妥当じゃないか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_253<tab>But I am not certain what to make of that castle. Could it somehow be connected to the subjects?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_253<tab>それにしても、表面に映ってるのはなんだ……城か……？
あの城にまつわる被検者が、中に格納されている……？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_ALPHA_000_254<tab>Kweh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_ALPHA_000_254<tab>クエーッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_255<tab>Alpha! But hold on a moment... Shouldn't either one or the other of us be translucent?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_255<tab>アルファ！
あれっ、オイラたち、まだ権利を返してないはずッス？
なんでどっちも透けてないッス？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_256<tab>(-Omega-)<blip> Subjects confirmed to have arrived at the Deltascape. Analysis complete.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_256<tab>(-オメガ-)ガガガ……。
対象の被検世界「デルタ」への到達を確認。
戦闘力の計測……完了。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_257<tab>(-Omega-)Congratulations, you are approved for participation. Your strength places you in the selfsame tier as Alpha─the feeblest and farthest removed from myself.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_257<tab>(-オメガ-)おめでとうございます、アナタがたは合格です。
確実に、明確に、オメガから最も遠いもの……
「アルファ」にふさわしい弱さだと証明されました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_258<tab>(-Omega-)Nonetheless, you are now fully fledged test subjects. Welcome, weakest of challengers.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_258<tab>(-オメガ-)ウエルカム、最弱の挑戦者たち。
アナタがたの正式エントリーを認めましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_259<tab>(-Omega-)As corporeal life-forms, you need not undergo development within a test world. Instead, you may use this space freely.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_259<tab>(-オメガ-)すでに確固たる生命として実体をもつアナタがたは、
「卵」の内側で育てられる必要もない。
ロビーにおける干渉を全承認したので、自由に使いなさい。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_260<tab>Not quite what I would have chosen, but one must make do.
...Speaking of which: what is it that we're supposed to do, exactly?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_260<tab>こんな場所じゃ、くつろげる気がしないがな……。
それで、晴れて正式採用になった俺たちは、
こっから何をすりゃあいいンだ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_261<tab>(-Omega-)You are to enter the Deltascape and defeat all test subjects within.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_261<tab>(-オメガ-)指令……被検世界「デルタ」に侵入を。
中で待ち受けるすべての被検体を、撃破しなさい。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_262<tab>(-Omega-)Please note, however, that strength in numbers will not be acknowledged. There is a strict limit upon how many entities may participate in combat.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_262<tab>(-オメガ-)ただし、ワタシは数に頼った武力の価値を認めません。
そのため、各世界の内部には、
それぞれに干渉の制限をかけています。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_263<tab>(-Omega-)Only a small party may have existential authorization transferred from Alpha. Good luck. <blip>
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_OMEGA_000_263<tab>(-オメガ-)都度、アルファから権利を譲渡された小数の者のみが、
戦闘行為に参加することができます。
それでは、健闘を…………ガガ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_264<tab>So the eggs <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> contain our fellow test subjects─just as I predicted, eh, Garlond?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_264<tab>……卵の中身は、やっぱりそれか。
オレの読みはハズレてなかっただろ、ガーロンドォ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_265<tab>Before we turn our thoughts to the Deltascape, I suggest we set up a base of operations here.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_265<tab>ともかく、この先に調査拠点を造ろう。
「デルタ」世界に攻め込むとしても、それからだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_ALPHA_000_270<tab>Kweh?
target: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_ALPHA_000_270<tab>クエッ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_275<tab>Quite impressive for an improvised arrangement, even if I do say so myself. Now then, let us see what we can learn from our host's many monitors.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_NERO_000_275<tab>ククク……見ろよ、即席の作業場にしては上出来だろ？
さて、このカワイコチャンたちから、
どンな情報を引き出してやるかねぇ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_280<tab>I was thinking about asking the crew to throw some supplies in after us. But only the gods know if they'd make it here in one piece. You can bet they wouldn't be the right way up if they did, though.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_BIGGS_000_280<tab>地上に残ってる社員に頼んで、
もっといろんな資材を投げ込んでもらうか。
無事に届くか……？

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_285<tab>Whew... All that jumping and fading and fighting really took it out of me...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_285<tab>ひぃ、ふぅ……。
戦ったり力仕事をしたり、へとへとッス……。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_290<tab>What I need now is a steaming-hot cup of tea...and nothing makes a better brew than the Mark XIV Thermocoil Boilmaster, coming soon to a Garlond Ironworks-approved vendor near you!
...S-Sorry. Jessie made me do it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_WEDGE_000_290<tab>こういうときは、近ごろ量産化に成功した、
シュワシュワケトルXIV世……
通称「ケトルXIV世」で、お茶休憩ッス～！

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_300<tab>It's somewhat cobbled together, but this should suffice as a base of operations.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_300<tab>よし……。
急造ではあるが、どうにか調査拠点ができた。

source: TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_301<tab>Take heart, old friend. Though every step we take seems to raise more questions, we will wade through this mire of mysteries eventually, of that I have no doubt.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR101_02928_CID_000_301<tab>今のところは、謎が深まるばかりだが……
これからともに解明していこう、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
あらためて、「次元の狭間」の調査開始だ！
